files.patch:
@@ -219,1 +219,2 @@
-// 8 bytes vector registers are saved by default on riscv64.
+// riscv do not ovlerlay the floating-point registers on vector registers.
+// vector registers are saved by default on riscv when RVV is enabled.
@@ -221,1 +222,1 @@
-  return size > 8;
+  return UseRVV;
